title: Wall Street Hit With Tell-All TikToks
itunes:title: Wall Street Hit With Tell-All TikToks
description:
Bloomberg News Personal Finance Reporter Misyrlena Egkolfopoulou explains how some Wall Street analysts are increasingly posting about their lives on TikTok in an industry characterized by its confidentiality. Ron Coughlin, CEO at Petco, discusses earnings and the strength of its end-to-end health and wellness ecosystem. And we Drive to the Close with Tom Plumb, President and CIO at Plumb Funds.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
